Class SlashOwnerOnly

Initializes a new instance of the SlashOwnerOnly class, intended for slash command based owner-only operations within the Mewdeko bot framework.

Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.OwnerOnly
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("owneronly", "Commands only the bot owner can use")]
public class SlashOwnerOnly : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<OwnerOnlyService>, IInteractionModuleBase

SlashOwnerOnly(DiscordSocketClient, IBotStrings, InteractiveService, ICoordinator, DbService, IDataCache, GuildSettingsService, CommandHandler)

Initializes a new instance of the SlashOwnerOnly class, intended for slash command based owner-only operations within the Mewdeko bot framework.

Declaration
public SlashOwnerOnly(DiscordSocketClient client, IBotStrings strings, InteractiveService serv, ICoordinator coord, DbService db, IDataCache cache, GuildSettingsService guildSettings, CommandHandler commandHandler)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client used to interact with the Discord API.
IBotStrings strings

Provides access to localized strings within the bot.
InteractiveService serv

Interactive service for handling interactive user commands.
ICoordinator coord

Coordinator for managing bot operations across different services and modules.
DbService db

Service for database operations and access.
IDataCache cache

Cache service for storing and retrieving temporary data.
GuildSettingsService guildSettings

Service for accessing and modifying guild-specific settings.
CommandHandler commandHandler

Handler for processing and executing commands received from users.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Bash(string)

Executes a bash command. Depending on the platform, the command is executed in either bash or PowerShell.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("bash", "Executes a bash command on the host machine", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task Bash(string message)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string message

The command to execute.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

The command is executed in a new process, and the output is sent as a paginated message. If the process hangs, it is terminated. The command has a timeout of 2 hours. The output is split into chunks of 1988 characters to avoid Discord message limits.

| Edit this page View Source

ClearUsedTokens()

Clears the count of used GPT tokens after confirming with the user.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("clearusedtokens", "Clears the used gpt tokens count", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task ClearUsedTokens()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command prompts the user for confirmation before proceeding to clear the used token count. If the user confirms, it clears the count and notifies the user of completion.

| Edit this page View Source

CommandStats()

Retrieves and displays statistics on the most used command, module, guild, and user.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("commandstats", "Get stats about commands", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task CommandStats()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This method calculates and reports the top entities based on their usage count. It displays the most frequently used command, the module that's used the most, the user who has used commands the most, and the guild with the highest command usage. These statistics are presented as an embed in the Discord channel.

| Edit this page View Source

Die()

Initiates a shutdown of the bot.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("die", "Shuts down the bot", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task Die()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Before shutting down, the bot attempts to send a confirmation message. Delays for a short period before triggering the shutdown sequence.

| Edit this page View Source

Evaluate()

Evaluates a C# code snippet. Launched a modal to do so.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("eval", "Eval C# code", false, RunMode.Default)]
[OwnerOnly]
public Task Evaluate()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

The code is compiled and executed in a sandboxed environment. The result is displayed in an embed, including the return value, compilation time, and execution time.

Type Condition
ArgumentException

ImagesReload()

Initiates the reloading of images used by the bot.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("imagesreload", "Recaches and redownloads all images", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task ImagesReload()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command triggers a process to reload all images, ensuring that any updates to image resources are reflected without restarting the bot. A confirmation message is sent upon the start of the reload process.

string guildStr

The identifier or name of the guild to leave.

Task
Remarks

This action is irreversible through bot commands and should be used with caution.

ListServers()

Lists all servers the bot is currently in.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("listservers", "List all servers the bot is in", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task ListServers()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This method creates a paginated list of servers, showing server names, IDs, member counts, online member counts, server owners, and creation dates. Pagination allows browsing through the server list if it exceeds the page limit.

Executes a Redis command and returns the result.

Declaration

public Task RedisExec(string command)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string command

The Redis command to execute.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This method sends the specified command to Redis through the configured cache connection. The result of the command execution is then sent back as a message in the Discord channel.

Task
Remarks

Parameters
Type Name Description
int shardId

The ID of the shard to restart.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Sends a confirmation message if the shard is successfully marked for restart, or an error message if the shard ID is not found.

Send(ulong, ulong, string?)

Sends a message to a specified channel or user.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("send", "Sends a message to a server or dm", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task Send(ulong whereOrTo, ulong to = 0, string? msg = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong whereOrTo

The ID of the channel or user to send the message to.
ulong to

The ID of the user to send the message to.
string msg

The message to send.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

If the first ID is a server, the second ID is a channel, and the message is sent to that channel.

ShardStats()

Displays statistics for all shards of the bot, including their statuses, guild counts, and user counts.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("shardstats", "Shows the stats for all shards", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task ShardStats()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command aggregates the current status of all shards and displays a summary followed by a detailed paginated list of each shard's status, including the time since last update, guild count, and user count. The statuses are represented by emojis for quick visual reference.

| Edit this page View Source

SqlExec(string)

Executes a raw SQL command against the database.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("sqlexec", "Run a sql command", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task SqlExec(string sql)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string sql

The SQL command to execute.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Prompts the user for confirmation before executing the SQL command. The number of affected rows is sent back as a message in the Discord channel. Use with caution, as executing raw SQL can directly affect the database integrity.

| Edit this page View Source

StringsReload()

Initiates the reloading of bot strings (localizations).

Declaration
[SlashCommand("stringsreload", "Reloads localized strings", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task StringsReload()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command triggers a process to reload all localized strings, ensuring that any updates to text resources are applied without restarting the bot. A confirmation message is sent upon successful reloading of bot strings.

Sudo(string, IUser)

Executes a command as if it were sent by the specified guild user.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("sudo", "Run a command as another user", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task Sudo(string args, IUser user = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string args

The command string to execute, including command name and arguments.
IUser user

The guild user to impersonate when executing the command.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This method constructs a fake message with the specified user as the author and the given command string, then enqueues it for command parsing and execution.
